member.name: PROG_INVOKE_SETTING
member.summary: The PROG_INVOKE_SETTING enumeration indicates the initial setting of the function used to track the progress of a call to the or function.

member.name: PROG_INVOKE_SETTING.ProgressInvokeEveryObject
member.summary: Invoke the progress function for every object.

member.name: PROG_INVOKE_SETTING.ProgressInvokeOnError
member.summary: Invoke the progress function only when an error is encountered.

summary.div: Note The original state of the tree will not be reset, and the results are unpredictable.

member.name: PROG_INVOKE_SETTING.ProgressInvokePrePostError
member.summary: Invoke the progress function before and after applying security on the object and on the error.
